ValidationRule.description: When case owner is 'XDR Escalations', Escalation Reason, Escalation Description and XDR Escalation Team fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support', BEGINS(OwnerId, '00G'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Closed')), OR( ISBLANK(Escalation_Reason__c), ISBLANK(Escalation_Description__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(XDR_Escalation_Team__c)) ), Case_Owner_Queue_Name__c == 'XDR Escalations' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Escalation Reason, Escalation Description, XDR Escalation Team Required when TS case is escalated to XDR Escalations queue
